transcript:
Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello sir.
Customer: Ah, sir 18 glow up sir.
Executive: Come sir.
Customer: Ah, sir na andru India martle irunthu pesuren sir catalog team irunthu.
Customer: Ah, sollunga sir.
Executive: Ah, yes sir. Sir actually ippo unga profile inniki morning than enakku assign ayirukku account manager ah ippo nan than ungaloda profile paarthen. Ah, neenga neethu vanthu paathinga na Rajesh Kumar appadinnu sollittu ungaloda previous or onboard panna manager irukkaangaleingala avangala kuppittirukkeenga call illingala?
Customer: Ah, aama sir aama.
Executive: Ah, yes sir avanga pick pannalaya irukkeenga sir athunale inga namakku vanthu athu oru ticket rise ayirukku seri athu than ungalukku edhavathu doubts illa edhavathu query irunthuthuna atha solve pannalaamnu than call pannen sollunga sir edhavathu issues ungalukku irunthuchu.
Customer: Issues la illa sir athan live aayiruchu atha procedure ennanu kekkaanga.
Executive: Okay okay sir okay athan sir unga catalog vanthu neethu late evening than live aayirukkumnu ninaikkiren actually enakku receive aanathu vanthu inniki morning than enakku receive aachu. Sir ithukku appuram vanthu paathinga na neenga buyleads enquiries ellame edukka start pannikkalaam sir.

Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello ah sollunga sir sollunga kekkuthu.
Executive: Ah athan sir neenga buyleads enquiries ellame edukka start pannikkalaam sir ungalukku weekly vanthu paathinga na 17 buyleads vanthu provide pannuvaanga sir. So athavathu intha
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Week start aagumbothu ungalukku vanthuttu 10 leads sir every sunday vanthu paathinga na ungalukku 10 leads allocate aagum.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Okayingala so athu poga daily oru bonus lead appadingarathu ungalukku receive aagum sir so weekly overalla ungalukku 17 buyleads vanthu receive aagum. Ithu vanthu paathinga na every sunday than sir ungalukku allocate aagum so intha weekkaanathu athavathu coming week naalai irunthu than ungalukku pathu lead vanthu allocate aagum but inniki edhavathu leads ungalukku edukkanumnalum neenga edukka ungalukku early leads antha maari ungalukku oru 10 leads vanthu koduthiruppaanga already.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Ah yes sir so neenga contact panni pesunga so oru naalukku vanthu paathinga na maximum oru moonu customers vanthu neenga contact panni approach pannura maari neenga regularave follow pannikkonga sir.
Customer: Hmm, seri seri.
Executive: Yes sir so ippo buyleads nu oru option kaattuthaan sir ungalukku mobile appla thane neenga use panreenga install pannirukkeengala?
Customer: Aama mobile appla.
Executive: Okay sir athula buyleads nu oru column irukka sir thaniya oru page irukka buyleads nu.
Customer: Ah irukku sir irukku sir.
Executive: Athu open pannikkonga sir.
Customer: Ah open pannikkonga.
Executive: Athula list of leads vanthu kaattuthaan sir ungalukku ennentha leads ellam kaasu vanthurukku appadingarathu kaattuthaan rabbit hair oil antha maari ellam.
Customer: Aama kaattuthu sir.
Executive: Ah yes sir so ungalukku entha category vanthu set aagum illa entha lead vanthu ungalukku suitable aagumnu paathu athula specificca neenga vanthu leads choose panni pesunga sir eppadi neenga contact pannuveengannu paathinga na intha lead vanthu ungalukku okay suitablea irukknu neenga select panreenga nu vachukkongale athukku munnadi pakkathile oru star symbol maari irukka lead ellaathileyme.
Customer: Ah athula seri sir sonnanga sir star list pannurathukku sonnanga.
Executive: Ah antha shortlist koduthuttu keela contact buyer nu oru option irukkum sir atha click panninga na customeroda contact details avanga engernthu ketrukkaanga ellame ungalukku vanthu theriyum.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: So neenga eduthuttu directta customer call panni avangalukku enna maari requirements irukku so nammalodathu avangalukku eppadi vanthu suitablea irukkum ennaingaratha neenga discuss pannittu atha ordera neenga vanthu convert pannikkalaam.
Customer: Seringa sir seri.
Executive: Okayingala sir so inthu maari inthu maari neenga vanthuttu oru naalakku moonu customers vanthu neenga maximum approach pannura maari follow pannikkonga sir.
Customer: Hmm okay okay okay.
Executive: Neenga lead edukkarathukku munnadi sir anga intha buylead contact buyer now keela paathinga na buyer info appadinnu solli koduthirukkeengala?
Customer: Aama.
Executive: Athula vanthu avanga evlo yearsa India martla irukkaangannu kaattum one plus years two plus years antha maari pottrukka okay okay okay okay aama neenga edukara lead vanthu paathinga na above one yearkku mela irukkura maari leads vanthu choose pannikkinga appuram avanga India martla enna maari products buy pannirukkaanga avanga namma product relateda view pannirukkaangala buyer also viewedla kaattuthaa ithu ellam check pannittu antha lead vanthu consume pannunga sir.
Customer: Okay sir seri seri.
Executive: Ah oru lead vanthu ungalukku eduthirukkeenga namma categoryla avangalukku thevai irukku ungalukku antha lead vanthu correctaa irunthuchu usefulla irukknu na athukku vanthu thumbs up antha like symbol maari ungalukku namma onnu vanthu kodukkalaam sir athuvume naan ungalukku solren pakkathula lead manager nu oru option irukka sir buyleads pakkathula.
Customer: Buyleads pakkathula aama sollirunthaanga sir.
Executive: Ah athu open pannikkinga sir.
Customer: Ah pannitten sir.

Customer: Panniyaachu sir.
Executive: Ah sir athula first irukkura ah sir athula first irukkura chat option maari irukka atha open pannikkinga sir first neenga enna consume pannirukkeengalo antha leadodathu chat maari irukkum atha open pannikkinga.
Executive: Namma whatsapp conversation maari irukkum.
Executive: Okay sir atha open pannathi kekkuthungala so is this enquiry relevant appadinnu kettu thumbs up thumbs down antha green and red colorla irukka sir.
Customer: Enakku edhume kaattalengale.
Executive: Ah is this buylead relevant appadinnu kettu ah call thumbs down maari product is available.
Executive: Ah athu ellam vanthu kaattum sir aana avanga oru message maari namma send pannathula keela koduthiruppaanga paarunga sir intha enquiry vanthu ungalukku relevantannu kettu thumbs up thumbs down maari rendu option koduthiruppaanga green and red colorla.
Customer: Kaanume.
Executive: Athu koduthutta ninaikkiren sir naan munnadi thumbs up koduthirukkeenga okay okay appo athunale athula show aagala so intha maari neenga follow panninga na ungalukku betteraana leads vanthu receive aagum sir.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Okay sir so neenga follow pannunga actually ungalukku vanthu paathinga na oru welcome call maari namma side irunthu arrange pannuvaanga sir oru guidance maari ippo ippo neenga vanthu newa onboard aayirukkeenga correctaa so ungalukku lead eppadi use pannannum plus vanthu ithula enna enna features ellam irukku ellame explain pannurathukku ungalukku oru google meet session sir athu neenga systemla join pannitteenga na ippo namma vanthu directta ungalukku meet panna vara maari irunthuna unga officela vanthu face to face paathu namma vanthu discuss pannuvom neenga ungalukku irukka doubts enkkitta kettu neenga clarify pannippeenga correctaa sir.
Customer: Aama sir.
Executive: But namma ippo ellame over the phone than pesittu irukkom so ungalukku edhavathu doubts irunthuthunalum neenga enkkitta kekka poreenga but ippo namma enna panromna systemla neenga face to face eppadi neenga paathu discuss pannuveengalo antha maari unga screenave neenga vanthu directta present panni namma livea discuss pannippom sir google meetla.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okayingala so athu vanthu welcome callnu sollittu ungalukku allocate pannuvaanga so inniki ungaloda live vanthurukka maybe ungalukku monday or tuesday antha maari welcome call vanthu allocate aagum oru meeting date maari enakku schedule pannuvaanga enakku schedule aanathi naan than ungalukku kuppiduven so actually ungaloda profile ippo enkkitta than assign aayirukku so naan than account managera ungala call pannuven so appo naan ungalukku innume briefa ithu pathi enna enna explain pannannumo ellame ungalukku cover panren sir.
Customer: Okay sir sure.
Executive: Okay sir so ungalukku vera edhavathu doubts irukka sir ithula ippo orallavukku idea irukku ellam leads edukarathukku.
Customer: Idea irukku.
Executive: Okay sir sir ippo naan ithu vanthu naan call pannirukkarathu systematic number sir naan ennodathu numberl irunthu ungalukku whatsappla oru message panren ennodathu name Anguraj neenga antha number vachukkonga edhavathu iruntha neenga enakku antha numberkku neenga contact pannunga.
Customer: Seri sir seri.
Executive: Okay sir actually sir neethu neenga antha person Rajesh appadingaravangala kuppittiruntheenga illingala ungaloda previous sales manager so avangalukku contact panni avanga edukkaama ponanale avinga vanthu oru ticketa rise aayirukkum so ippo ungalukku ithu than doubtnu ketruntheenga naan ungalukku clarify pannirukken so antha issue vanthu namma ippo close pannikkalaama sir.
Customer: Close pannikkalaam.
Executive: Seringa sir naan ippo close panren ungalukku vanthu paathinga na oru feedback mail maari varum sir naan ippo ungalukku explain pannathu illa naan ippo ungalukku guide pannathu vanthu ungalukku eppadi satisfieda irunthuchu appadinnu sollittu neenga atha satisfiednu ungaloda remark vanthu koduthu athula neenga enna feedback kodukkanumnalum neenga kodunga sir seringala.
Customer: Seri sir seri sir.
Executive: Seringa sir okay thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Enquiring about the procedure after catalog went live.

- Why the executive called him.



Resolution:

- Explained about buyleads and weekly allocation.

- Explained how to use leads and contact buyers.

- Explained about welcome call and google meet session.

- Clarified the reason for the call.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send a WhatsApp message.

- Customer will receive a feedback mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, welcome call, leads
